item.title: Curriculum vitae
item.description:
A Self-Introduction
#

Hi, please just call me Ziqian. I am a PhD student at the Education University of Hong Kong (2025 - present), supervised by Dr. Phil Duo Liu.

Before that, I have worked as a full-time research assistent for three years in Beijing and Hongkong (2022-2025). I recevied my Master’s degree (Psychological Foundation) from South China Normal University in 2022 and Bachelor’s degree (Psychology) from Jiangxi Normal University in 2019.
